title: 再帰関数 8
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#358cd6>int</color> func<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> a,<color=#358cd6>int</color> r,<color=#358cd6>int</color> n<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#c586c0>if</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>n == 1<color=#ffd700>)</color> <color=#c586c0>return</color> a;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> func<color=#ffd700>(</color>a,r,n-1<color=#ffd700>)</color>*r + a;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> a = 1,r = 3,n = 4;
  a = func<color=#ffd700>(</color>a,r,n<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d"</color>,a<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
